solution_line_template: If each sandwich comes with {strips_per_sandwich} strips of pepper, and each pepper makes {slices_per_pepper} slices, then each sandwich uses {strips_per_sandwich}/{slices_per_pepper}=<<{strips_per_sandwich}/{slices_per_pepper}={pepper_per_sandwich}>>{pepper_per_sandwich} pepper.

If the Sandwich Shop serves a sandwich every {minutes_per_sandwich} minutes, then per hour the Shop serves {minutes_per_hour}/{minutes_per_sandwich}=<<{minutes_per_hour}/{minutes_per_sandwich}={sandwiches_per_hour}>>{sandwiches_per_hour} sandwiches.
Thus, per hour, the Shop uses {sandwiches_per_hour}*{pepper_per_sandwich}=<<{sandwiches_per_hour}*{pepper_per_sandwich}={peppers_per_hour}>>{peppers_per_hour} jalapeno peppers.
And in an {hours_in_day}-hour day, the Sandwich Shop uses {hours_in_day}*{peppers_per_hour}=<<{hours_in_day}*{peppers_per_hour}={total_peppers_required}>>{total_peppers_required} jalapeno peppers.
